name: Rosa damascena
Relationship: Compare: in hay fever: PHLEUM PRATENSE - Timothy grass - (Hay-fever with asthma; watery coryza, itching of nose and eyes; frequent sneezing, dyspnoea. Use 6-30 potency. Rabe.) SUCCIN. ACID; SABAD.; EUPH.; PSOR.; KALI-HYD.; NAPHT.
details: Useful in the beginning of hay-fever, with involvement of Eustachian tube.
